attributes.action: ensure that patients being transported by the N.H.S. only travel on transport staffed by the Ambulance Service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a newly disabled person and travel on transport v.kindly arranged for me & paid for by the N.H.S. The Ambulance Service are trained experts and care for their charges in a manner that far exceeds the remit.

Private taxi-firms are sometimes used and the standard of care can be appalling. I worry for my well-being and that of other users, the attitude of some private hire drivers can have a detrimental effect on the mental well-being of a patient at the very least.

My treatment by a few mini-cab drivers leads me to believe that patients health may be seriously compromised or worse if this false economy should continue.

Let us act and stop this potential travesty immediately before someone dies as result of this so-called cost cutting measure.   

Respectfully Yours,

Glenn Anderson - Save Our (NHS) Staff -  (SOS-NHS)
